title: Don't say the same thing twice within 30s
message:
Don't say the same thing twice within 30s

On some devices we're getting duplicate notifications from the system.

With this change in place that shouldn't lead to us saying the same
thing twice any more.

title: Update build environment
message: Update build environment

title: Merge branch 'privacy-policy'
message: Merge branch 'privacy-policy'

title: Be less specific about statistics collection
message:
Be less specific about statistics collection

This gives us more freedom to collect more / less / other statistics in
the future. And since this data is anonymous anyway, it shouldn't affect
anybody's privacy, and being more vague should be fine.

title: Add a Privacy Policy as required by Google
message:
Add a Privacy Policy as required by Google

As a side effect of adding this policy, stop sending app logs to
Crashlytics. Those logs are potentially sensitive, and retaining them
would make the privacy policy much more complex.

If people want to report when the app "feels" bad, they can do so using
the contact-the-developer functionality built into the app.

title: Only announce non-declined events
message:
Only announce non-declined events

A non-user-visible issue is still that we're getting false alarms when an event
is edited on the device.

title: Announce calendar events
message:
Announce calendar events

A known issue is that we're getting false alarms when an event is edited on the
device.

They are however timestamped with the time of the change, not the time of any
alarms, so what happens is that we don't find any matching events when looking
for them, and we don't say anything. We should treat this in a good way; logging
exceptions every time it happens saying that no events were found might not be
it.

Another known issue is that we announce declined events. We shouldn't do that.

title: Simplify WifiReceiver
message:
Simplify WifiReceiver

Before this change it was more complex and didn't announce Wifi disconnects
properly.

With this change, it does produce duplicate announcements, but they are filtered
by the SpeakerService anyway so that shouldn't matter.

title: Android Lint: Disable code-calls-non-Android-APIs warning
message:
Android Lint: Disable code-calls-non-Android-APIs warning

It's language-detector that calls:
/Users/johan/.gradle/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/net.arnx/jsonic/1.2.11/d85dcd1c5469673b58ec78ceae8a675e2c730c66/jsonic-1.2.11.jar: Error: Invalid package reference in library; not included in Android: javax.servlet.http. Referenced from net.arnx.jsonic.web.Container. [InvalidPackage]
/Users/johan/.gradle/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/net.arnx/jsonic/1.2.11/d85dcd1c5469673b58ec78ceae8a675e2c730c66/jsonic-1.2.11.jar: Error: Invalid package reference in library; not included in Android: javax.servlet. Referenced from net.arnx.jsonic.web.Container. [InvalidPackage]
/Users/johan/.gradle/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/com.optimaize.languagedetector/language-detector/0.5/90a8d2bb986bdbcb3df66be13a963906dfd0cb49/language-detector-0.5.jar: Error: Invalid package reference in library; not included in Android: javax.xml.stream. Referenced from com.cybozu.labs.langdetect.GenProfile. [InvalidPackage]

None of those seem to affect us though, so we'll just disable the warning for
now. Fixing language-detector to not use those as all should be simple as well;
the Jsonic stuff isn't even used AFAICT and XML can probably be parsed some
other way.

title: Android Lint: Protect our SMS receiver
message:

title: Android Lint: Never mind Google App Indexing
message:

title: Android Lint: We don't care about data backups

message:

I've arbitrarily decided to take the Crashlytics route here.
